personAnouncement: I am glad you made it!
smallText: Keep scrolling to find out why you will want to hire me.

keyAssetsControl.label: These are the qualities I'm mostly proud of:

assetList.title: Developing business
assetList.text: The primary goal of each task I perform is improvement in your business. After many years in IT I perfectly realize and always keep in mind that any improvement should bring value to the business and sponsors. Without this in mind even brilliant effort can end up ineffective.

assetList.title: Passionate about IT
assetList.text: Information technology is my obsession, which means I never get tired from it. It also means you don't have to motivate me doing great job since it's my destiny.

assetList.title: Long-term vision
assetList.text: Not only is know pain points my constant priority, but many years of experience behind my shoulders also allow me to foresee customer future needs and verify them with stakeholders.

sections.title: SharePoint Architect
sections.anouncement: Let's make this solution even greater!

assetList.title: Negotiating with customer and interpreting their demands
Evaluating multiple ways of implementing the solution
Foresee and address future customer demands

sections.title: Developer
sections.anouncement: Find out if my competence matches what you need

sections.title: Contact
sections.anouncement: I look forward to hearing from you
